item.title: Blair's 'Forgotten People'
item.description: *“Behind the statistics lie households where three generations have never had a job. There are estates where the biggest employer is the drugs industry, where all that is left of the high hopes of the post-war planners is derelict concrete.

item.title: Photogrammetry
item.description: As part of interview 02, I used photogrammetry to reconstruct a model of Milena’s bedroom â€“ the room she most experienced damp problems within her flat.

item.title: Shadowing a Damp Survey
item.description: In order to better understand damp housing from a technical perspective, I contacted several professional damp surveyors asking to interview them or shadow one of their surveys.

item.title: Surviving Squalor: Britain's Housing Shame
item.description: ITV’s hour-long broadcast Surviving Squalor: Brtiain’s Housing Shame aired on 12th September, 2021. This formed part of a longer, ongoing investigation, lead by political correspondent Daniel Hewitt, which started in late 2020 and was first reported on in late March 2021.
